summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of the west 70 feet of the north 133.33' of the NW 1/4 of the NW 1/4 less the west 30' less street, being Tax Lot 78, Section 23-25-3, with respect to Use District, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto one new section numbered 2-418.
